english.segment1: Waiting in a corner standing. Playing out the best case. Your pleasure is nearing.
english.segment2: Hunt them. Get away. Hurt them.
english.segment3: In a moment madness reeling. Theres no one watching now, the innocence dying.
english.segment4: Hunt them. Get away. Hurt them.
english.segment5: Nothing Breathes inside.. Nothing Lives inside..
english.segment6: Sickening cries call out. Begging to be released, only to find, theyre falling on deaf ears.
english.segment7: Hunt them. Get away. Hurt them.
english.segment8: Nothing Breathes inside.. Nothing Lives inside..(x 2)
